name: Bump (Impostor Studios)
description:
This game is all about dashing and bumping into things, while trying not to get bumped yourself. 

There are two types of objects: Blobs and Players.

Dash and bump into Blobs to dye them in your color and claim them for yourself. When the round is over, the Player with the most Blobs in his color wins.

If you dash and bump into other Players, you switch all your Blobs with theirs, possibly stealing their victory and ruining your friendship forever.





Dash against Blobs Dash against Players Controls Infos
  • This game is made to be played with controllers (preferably xbox, but others should work as well)
  • Local multiplayer for up to 4 Players (dont play this game alone, you can but it wont be much fun)
Credits
